content: If a tree falls in the forest, and there's nobody around to hear, does it make a sound?
translations: ita:Se un albero cade in una foresta con nessuno attorno, fa rumore﹖
ita:Se un albero cade in una foresta con nessuno intorno, fa rumore﹖
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Adelpa (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
